channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The UK’s Top 6 Mattresses in a Box to Improve Your Sleep in 2025
item.description: Our UK team has its own guide to the best British mattresses in a box and picks the Nectar Premier Hybrid Mattress as the best bed you can buy online.

item.title: Lucid Motors wins bankruptcy auction for Nikola’s Arizona factory and other assets
item.description: EV startup Lucid Motors has emerged as a surprise winner in the bankruptcy auction for electric trucking company Nikola’s Arizona factory and other as...

item.title: Leaders from Accel and Paladin Capital Group join the stage at StrictlyVC London in May
item.description: Mark your calendar — StrictlyVC London is just around the corner on 13 May. Designed for founders, entrepreneurs, and investors, this exclusive gather...

item.title: Tesla used car listings skyrocketed in March
item.description: A growing number of Tesla owners are putting their used vehicles up for sale, as consumers react to Elon Musk’s political activities and the global pr...

item.title: The 24 Best Movies on Apple TV+ Right Now (April 2025)
item.description: The Gorge, Number One on the Call Sheet, and Blitz are just a few of the movies you should be watching on Apple TV+ this month.

item.title: The Trump Administration Is Turning Science Against Itself
item.description: In addition to firing researchers and pulling funds, the Trump administration is also inverting science.

item.title: How Chef Robotics found success by turning away its original customers
item.description: A few years ago, Chef Robotics was hurting. But founder Rajat Bhageria turned it around by doing something that early-stage founders fear to do.

item.title: Trump’s Trade War Is Strengthening China’s Soft Power
item.description: President Trump’s tariffs are boosting China’s global image even as they threaten to decimate its economy.

item.title: Hundreds of Video Game Workers Join New Union as Trump Attacks Labor Rights
item.description: The United Videogame Workers union is open to any gaming worker in the US and Canada and will focus on industry-wide job loss.

item.title: Stripe CEO says he ensures his top leaders interview a customer twice a month
item.description: Digital payments platform Stripe invites customers to join its management team meetings on a bi-weekly basis so it can get “candid feedback,” accordin...
